title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
OB: All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash when resizing the window in the vertical direction only.
EB: Tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash when resizing the window in the vertical direction only.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
